about.title: About
about.education: Department of Electrical and Electronic Engineering, National Institute of Technology, Tomakomai College, Hokkaido, Japan

graduation_research.title: Graduation Research
graduation_research.contents: I focused on audio recording as one of the applications of drones, and studied the implementation of signal processing methods to reduce drone driving noise. I used Raspberry Pi for the processing medium and the Golang for the library of Adaptive Filters. Take a look at go-adflib I created.

sony.title: Internship at Sony (R&D)
sony.contents: I investigated existing sound specialization technology for research and development of software technology for next-generation AR / VR. I ran experiments in Unity and analyzed acoustic data within Python.

mongol.title: Internship at Ishida (Development)
mongol.contents: I joined a technical internship in Mongolia. As a Japanese college (Kosen) student, I interacted with teachers and students at the college (kosen) of technology in Mongolia, and contributed to the improvement of technical skills in Mongolia.

ishida.title: Internship at Ishida (Development)
ishida.contents: I evaluated the electrical reliability of the device under development. And I developed embedded software for sorting and display tags to improve the productivity of existing distribution systems.
